reviews.title: IIM Shillong - Experience
reviews.name: Aviral Gupta

content.title: Admission
content.content:
I applied to all different IIM and XLRI. 
This was tge best college as per NIRF Ranking that I could get into. 

I couldn't make it due to rejection in interview process. 

Admission is through CAT, post which interview id there.

content.title: Course Curriculum Overview
content.content:
Course give focus during first year on overall basics of each stream - fin, marketing, ops

- Presentation and case study based learning focus is there. 

- More focus on experiential learning can be there with more internship

- Exams held every 1.5 month's

reviews.review_images_title: IIM Shillong Indian Institute of Management|Shillong

reviews.title: IIM Shillong: Campus in clouds
reviews.name: Shubham Kain

content.title: Admission
content.content: The entrance exam is CAT, with cut-off percentiles varying for different profiles. Then you have a WAT(Written ability test) and then a Personal Interview, the selection is tough. Once can find all the relevant information about the college and the entrance process easily on the internet, it is widely available.

content.title: Course Curriculum Overview
content.content: The course designed is great, although at many a times, while in the course you feel the heat and pressure. But then that's kind of required and when you enter the corporate world you get to know why. And since you get to choose almost all the subjects in the second year, it also gives you the independence to carve your path. The classrooms are equipped with all the necessary technological tools required, but more than that, the way you get to interact with your faculties is outstanding. The difficulty level depends on faculties, but you can expect some pressure throughout the course, although the 1st year has the majority of it.

reviews.title: IIM Shillong: Creating future , Shaping Leaders - Personal Insight
reviews.name: NIKITA KUMARI

content.title: Admission
content.content:
The eligibility criteria for the PGP program at IIM Shillong require candidates to hold a Bachelor's degree with a minimum of 60% in both 10th and 12th grades. Admission is facillitated through the CAT score,with the exam taking place in the month of November every year. Application forms are available from August. Applicants can apply for all IIMs ,including IIM Shillong through CAT form. 

As a General category candidate, I did not avail any reservation benefits. Notably , IIM shillong assigns a 15% weightage to work experience , and my direct offer was based on an evaluation of 85%. It's worth mentioning that freshers may need to invest additional effort in the GD and PI processes at IIM Shillong. Interestingly , IIM Shillong uniquely conducts GD before PI , unlike other IIMs.

content.title: Course Curriculum Overview
content.content:
IIM Shillong being the 7th oldest IIM ,after IIM Indore , provide one of the best PGP program . My rationale behind choosing PGP course of IIM Shillong was it being a general course ,without any specialisation. It gives opportunity to explore all fields of management like Marketing, Analytics , Operations ,HR , Consulting etc, and didn't restrict your career scope to one specialisation. 

There are in total 42 faculty members for PGP core course ,evenly covering all domains of studies. Additionally ,in each trimester college keep on inviting guest faculties as well. All faculties have done Phd in their fields , which clearly reflects in their teaching style. 

IIM Shillong conduct 3 trimesters each year. Academics become pretty tough ,if a student is not good at time management accommodating with stress. IIM Shillong is pretty hectic and tough in terms of exams and academics.

pos_sentences: Campus is at extremely good state and city
many opportunities for students to learn and apply the same knowledge
neg_sentences: There is nothing to dislike about IIM Shillong
reviews.title: Life at IIM Shillong (Campus at Clouds)
reviews.name: Anonymous

content.title: Admission
content.content: I appeared for CAT(Common Admission Test) and scored 99.34%ile, and the cut for admission to IIM Shillong is also in the same range. The application form for this college was in the CAT form itself. The admission process was online, the only improvement that I want to see in future is that the admission process going online in the upcoming years.

content.title: Course Curriculum Overview
content.content: The course curriculum is excellent as well as faculty members are also extremely experienced and possess industry knowledge. the faculty-student ratio is around 1:7. They use practical teaching methods. Term exams are slightly tough as the standard of IIM Shillong is very high and it is one of the top institutes in India.

reviews.review_images_title: IIM Shillong Indian Institute of Management|Shillong

reviews.title: Rigorous and rewarding course intertwined with scenic beauty of Shillong
reviews.name: Shardul Parab

content.title: Admission
content.content: The admissions process at all IIMs is nearly identical. It all begins with an application for the Common Admission Test, or CAT. When applying for the CAT, pick the programme PGPM under College name to be considered for admission to IIM Shillong. If you wish to attend this prestigious college, you must achieve a high percentile on the CAT or GMAT exam. Following the completion of the application form, a Group Discussion or Personal Interview round for the relevant course will be held. The offer letter will then be given to the selected students.

content.title: Course Curriculum Overview
content.content: It's a two-year residential program with rigorous academics. The course curriculum addressed all important components of the management idea as well as the economy's most recent industry trends. The course is developed in a comprehensive approach, encompassing material from numerous professions and allowing students to get a taste of how other routes work before deciding on a specialty. Professors use pedagogical practices to help students gain a better knowledge of the material. Despite the fact that the classes were held online due to the pandemic teachers were amazing and we also experienced real-time case studies and various activities for better understanding.

reviews.title: IIM Shillong - No. 7 IIM in India
reviews.name: ITI CHOUDHARY

content.title: Admission
content.content: The admission process for all IIMs is almost the same. It starts by applying for CAT which is the Common Admission Test. In order to be eligible for admission to IIM Shillong, select the program PGPM under College name while applying for CAT. Every IIM has its own shortlist criteria for candidates. IIM Shillong to release its cutoff list and criteria. The candidates who meet minimum score are called for further process

content.title: Course Curriculum Overview
content.content: The course is designed in a holistic manner covering subjects from various fields giving students an opportunity to get a taste of how different avenues work and take a pick for their specialisation. Even though the classes are conducted online because of the pandemic, the faculty always came prepared to class and tried to match the experience even in the online mode.

reviews.review_images_title: IIM Shillong Indian Institute of Management|Shillong

reviews.title: The Campus in Clouds
reviews.name: Anwesha Das

content.title: Admission
content.content:
I had applied for the Institute of Rural Management Anand and Xavier Institute of Management Bhubaneswar. I decided to choose IIM Shillong as it provided a larger pool of opportunities and had better rankings as compared to my other options. The eligibility criteria for the program is that the candidate must hold a Bachelor's Degree with at least 50% marks for General candidates. Indian students are required to qualify for the CAT. 
The admission process was very smooth, followed by an induction process.

content.title: Course Curriculum Overview
content.content: I have no prior work experience and I chose this course to understand various aspects of management which would prepare me for my career. It provided me with various academic and professional opportunities to explore and enhance my skill set. The faculty-student ratio is 30:200. The professors have diverse teaching methods, employing various tools. In the COVID scenario, they adapted to the situation and made efforts to make the classes as enriching and interactive as possible. We had 3 terms per year where we were rigorously tested on concepts and made to adapt to a high-stress environment, considering the various on-campus activities.

reviews.title: IIM Shillong Review
reviews.name: Anonymous

content.title: Admission
content.content:
I cleared the CAT and applied for all the IIM'S including CAP which Ahmedabad, Bangalore, Calcutta. Lucknow, Kozhikode, Shillong, and all the 10 IIM's which come under CAP and also the 4 baby IIM's and out of the colleges mentioned I was able to clear Shillong all the Cap's and the baby IIM'S and the reason for joining Shillong were many and to name a few 
A better Alum Base. 
Better Placements. 
College was older. 
The reputation of the college. 
Tackling with the Alumnis.
 I had the SC Quota through which I got the required admission and they check. 
The admission criteria was a Case Bases GD and also in addition there is no such thing as minimum marks as the admission process has a very big weightage given to the interview so there is no lower limit to the marks you would have to enter the college.
 The process was fairly smooth and the counseling day was fairly quick and you had to submit the required documents which included the 10th 12th and the undergraduate mark sheets.

content.title: Course Curriculum Overview
content.content:
I was fairly confused about what to do after my graduation and my stream was biotechnology. I was fairly confused, so after evaluating all my options, I decided to do my MBA weighing up my pros and cons. 
The ratio is around 1:40 
The faculty is fairly mixed with some very good teachers mixed with few average ones. 
The exams were quite timely and the exams were fairly easy barring some of the subjects.

reviews.review_images_title: IIM Shillong Indian Institute of Management|Shillong

reviews.title: Great College
reviews.name: Praveen Pandey

content.title: Admission
content.content:
The admission criteria consist of below three steps. 
1. Shortlisting candidates on the basis of cat score and calling them for the next process
2. Conducting case study-based group discussion followed by an interview. 
3. Shortlisting candidates for admission on the basis of accumulated cat score, 10th grads, 12th grad, graduation score, and GDPI performance.

content.title: Course Curriculum Overview
content.content: The course curriculum for the first year was aptly designed by the institute which covered all the fields related to business management. In the second year, a lot of subjects were floated by faculty which participants can select on the basis of their interest.

reviews.title: IIM Shillong - The Campus in Clouds
reviews.name: Shashank Mohit

content.title: Course Curriculum Overview
content.content: We don not have any specializations in IIM Shillong. Instead we can select from a variety of courses offered in different domains in our 2nd year. Some of the faculty are outstanding but most are average. We also get very good guest faculties from other top IIMs and abroad. Our course got delayed due to covid 19 but exams were still done in a timely manner. Difficulty level was moderate.

content.title: Placement Experience
content.content: We get a host of recruiters from different domains. Most of the offers are made in Marketing doamin. Many leading brands like Pepsico, ITC, BCN, Pidilite, AWS, Deloitte, etc regularly visit the campus both for summers and finals.Final Placement report here - https://www.iimshillong.ac.in/recruiters-iims/docs/pgp/IIM%20Shilong%20Final%20Placement%20Report%202018-20_May20.pdf

review_data.title: IIM Shillong: Creating future , Shaping Leaders - Personal Insight
review_data.name: NIKITA KUMARI

content.title: Prominent companies recruiting from campus, highest and average package being offered
content.content: IIM Shillong has 100% placement record . Last year 85 pre-placement offers were made and 63 recruiters visited campus for final placements. MBB visit campus. Other big companis like Google , Microsoft , Deloitte ,EY , Flipkart etc visit IIM Shillong. Last year average was Rs. 26.96 lakh , median was Rs. 26 lakh , and highest was Rs. 71 lakh.Companies offer roles in all domains like finance ,consulting , operations, HR and sales & marketing.

content.title: Internship opportunities provided by the college in renowned organizations
content.content: A summer internship cycle is run for student of first year, as doing a 2 months internship is part of curriculum and add credit. College is successful for 100 % internship placement for all the students. Big companies like cluster of MBB , Deloitte, EY etc visit for summers as well. Based on performance they even give PPO . Last year 85 PPOs were given to the batch of 200. Projects during internship depends on the role you have been picked for . It will include projects related to finance, consulting, HR , sales , Marketing ,operations etc.

content.title: College events, various clubs and facilities available in campus
content.content: IIM Shillong campus life is full of joy and sorrow. Academic plus placement rigour will make you feel like fish without water but then having lovley friends around plus supporting teachers will make it joyful. College has 22 Club and Committees in total . Each club has their own flagship event which they conduct once every year according to their timeline. Additionally clubs and comittess keep on conducting fun events and sessions for the whole batch. "Nirvana" is the annual fest of IIM Shillong . Cultural committee makes every festival joyful for all . Prom Night is one of the unique experience you will get in college. It has a one big library with all academic and non academic books available . Classroom are spacious with one white board and one smart board. Seats are comfortable .Shillong being a cold place , each classroom have heaters.

content.title: Total fees of the course and financial assistance available
content.content:
Currently , for the Batch of 2023-25 , total fees is Rs. 2500000, including tution fees , hostel fees ,Mess fees etc. Term wise breakup is Rs. 572800, Rs. 355000, Rs. 345000, Rs. 539000, Rs. 3400000, Rs. 330000 for Term I ,TermII ,Term III ,Term IV ,Term V and Term VI respectively. This is stagnant from past few years and no recent hike is expected.

IIM shillong provide "Need Based FInancial Assistance " to few economically challenged participants. After you join the program and apply for the scholarship , a seperate committee will look after this and the interested participants will be required to present their case . Governement of India scholarships are also available to those who fulfill the necessary criteria.

content.title: Students view on course and specializations being offered
content.content:
IIM Shillong being the 7th oldest IIM ,after IIM Indore , provide one of the best PGP program . My rationale behind choosing PGP course of IIM Shillong was it being a general course ,without any specialisation. It gives opportunity to explore all fields of management like Marketing, Analytics , Operations ,HR , Consulting etc, and didn't restrict your career scope to one specialisation. 

There are in total 42 faculty members for PGP core course ,evenly covering all domains of studies. Additionally ,in each trimester college keep on inviting guest faculties as well. All faculties have done Phd in their fields , which clearly reflects in their teaching style. 

IIM Shillong conduct 3 trimesters each year. Academics become pretty tough ,if a student is not good at time management accommodating with stress. IIM Shillong is pretty hectic and tough in terms of exams and academics.

content.title: Students view on hostel facilities
content.content: PGP program at IIM Shillong is residential and you will get a home away from home feeling at campus. Each student is provided with single accomodation. A single room is equipped with a bed , mattress , almirah , study table and chair. Mess provide you with four meals in a day. Food quality vary from average to good. At the time of admission , hostel committee of the college take care of your accomodation and room allotment.

content.title: What is the admission process being followed in the college?
content.content:
The eligibility criteria for the PGP program at IIM Shillong require candidates to hold a Bachelor's degree with a minimum of 60% in both 10th and 12th grades. Admission is facillitated through the CAT score,with the exam taking place in the month of November every year. Application forms are available from August. Applicants can apply for all IIMs ,including IIM Shillong through CAT form. 

As a General category candidate, I did not avail any reservation benefits. Notably , IIM shillong assigns a 15% weightage to work experience , and my direct offer was based on an evaluation of 85%. It's worth mentioning that freshers may need to invest additional effort in the GD and PI processes at IIM Shillong. Interestingly , IIM Shillong uniquely conducts GD before PI , unlike other IIMs.

scholarship.description:
IIM Shillong Scholarships are a source of constant support to students with an excellent academic approach and limited finance. The institute offers Need Based Financial Assistance to the deserving students. 

Have a look at the financial aid programmes available at IIM Shillong:- 

Table of Content

  1. IIM Shillong Scholarships
  2. Scholarships offered by the Government of India

2.1 National Fellowship & Scholarship for Higher Education of Scheduled Tribe Students (Central Sector Scheme)

2.2 Merit Cum Means Scholarship For Professional and Technical Courses CS

2.3 Central Sector Scheme for Scholarships for College and Universities Students

  1. IIM Shillong FAQs
 

IIM Shillong Scholarships

Need Based Financial Assistance Scheme 

  • IIM Shillong provides a Need Based Financial Assistance Scheme to help economically weak students. 
  • Such scholarships are introduced for students with an excellent academic record but with limited or zero finance. 
  • The scholarships are limited in number and dynamic depending upon the number of students with low family income. 
  • The quantum of assistance offered to students is decided on the basis of annual gross family income, credit worthiness, student’s assets, and so on.

Scholarships offered by the Government of India 

In addition to the Need Based financial aid, there are scholarships for Scheduled Caste (SC) / Scheduled Tribe (ST) / People with Disabilities (PWD) participants by the Government of India.

  • National Fellowship & Scholarship for Higher Education of Scheduled Tribe Students (Central Sector Scheme)
  • Merit Cum Means Scholarship For Professional and Technical Courses CS
  • Central Sector Scheme for Scholarships for College and Universities Students 

Have a detailed look at each of the above under IIM Shillong Scholarships offered by the Government of India. 

To know more click here IIM Shillong Ranking

National Fellowship & Scholarship for Higher Education of Scheduled Tribe Students (Central Sector Scheme)

  • These scholarships are for those who are willing to pursue higher degree courses like MPhil, Ph.D and belong to ST category. Students must have passed the Post-graduation/Master Degree examination in order to be eligible for National Fellowship Programmes.
  • Students eligible for availing such scholarships shall be selected on a merit-basis. Students can apply for the scholarships at the notified time, through https://fellowship.tribal.gov.in
  • Seats Availability:- There are a total of 750 seats for intake of students into National Fellowship Programmes. However, in contrast cases the following is to be done:- 

i) In case the number of applicants exceeds the number of available slots for awards, selection will be made on the basis of marks obtained in post-graduation exam.

ii) In cases when enough students from ST Category are not available, the no. of fellowships not availed by students during that year will be carried forward to the next academic year.

  • The scholarships are solely kept for providing financial assistance to the poor and meritorious students belonging to minority communities. This is to enable them to pursue professional and technical courses.

Eligibility

IIM Shillong Scholarships FAQs

Ques. Are there need based scholarships at IIM Shillong?

Ans. Yes, IIM Shillong offers need based financial assistance schemes for students with good academic records and limited finance. 

Ques. What are the scholarship programmes available for ST students? 

Ans. Programmes like National Fellowship & Scholarship for Higher Education of Scheduled Tribe Students (Central Sector Scheme) are available for ST students with a limited family income. 

Ques. How many seats are available in National Fellowship Programmes?

Ans. 750 seats are available for students availing National Fellowship Programmes. 

Ques. Are the Government of India Scholarships accepted at IIM Shillong? 

Ans. Yes, there are many financial assistance programs that are accepted by the institute IIM Shillong offered by the Government of India. To mention a few, Merit Cum Means Scholarship For Professional and Technical Courses CS, Central Sector Scheme for Scholarships for College and Universities Students and National Fellowship Scholarship. 

Ques. How many seats are available in the Central Sector Scheme Scholarships?

Ans. Around 82,000 seats are reserved for the students eligible to avail Central Sector Scheme Scholarships. 

Ques. How much reimbursement if offered in the scholarships offered by the Government of India? 

Ans. A good amount of reimbursement is aided to students availing Scholarships by the Government of India ranging from INR 12,000 to as high as INR 31,000 depending upon the scholarship programmes.

data.question: How good is IIM Shillong's PGPEX programme and how good are its placements?

basic.answer:
My brother received an interview call from IIM Shillong for their PGPEX program. This was a few years back. He wanted to join the course because he felt it would be beneficial for his corporate career. The teaching model at IIM Shillong focuses on developing Asian economies like China. 

The PGPEX is comparatively affordable at IIM Shillong, compared to other management schools. But the top management schools host international teachers as visiting faculty for their courses. 

Now here is the catch. The placements of IIM Shillong are entirely student driven. My brother reached out to a faculty member who was clear that the college offers its students a platform, but it can’t guarantee placements. During placements your entire profile will get you an offer, not just your ‘IIM Shillong’ tag. 

After careful consideration, my brother decided to not opt for PGPEX at IIM Shillong.

data.question: What are the selection criteria for IIM Shillong?

basic.answer:
The admissions process for the Post-Graduate Program (PGP) at IIM Shillong involves two stages. In the first stage, candidates who have qualified through the Common Admission Test (CAT) are shortlisted and invited to take the Writing Skills Assessment Test (WSAT) and participate in a Personal Interview (PI). The second stage involves the creation of a final merit list based on the candidates' performance in the WSAT, PI, and other relevant factors such as their GMAT scores, scholastic performance, and work experience.

Overseas candidates will also go through a similar process, with the Admissions Committee carefully reviewing their applications and shortlisting those who meet the necessary criteria. These candidates will then be invited to take the WSAT and participate in a PI, which may be held in one of four cities in India or conducted remotely via video conferencing. The final selection of candidates is based on their performance in the WSAT, PI, and the criteria used for shortlisting them for the PI. Tentative offers of admission will be made by the end of April, and registration for the PGP program is tentatively scheduled for the first week of July at the IIM Shillong campus.

data.question: Which one is better PGP-HRM MDI, MBA-core NMIMS, or IIM Shillong?

basic.answer:
If you're interested in PGP HRM, IIM Shillong is the best option in India in terms of placements. The average placement at MDI Gurgaon this year was INR 23.80 LPA, with a median package of INR 23.50 LPA and the highest package of INR 35.57 LPA. Top recruiters included Asian Paints, Infoedge India Limited, Axis Bank, Microsoft, Godrej, KPMG, HCL, Deloitte, Samsung, Google, Amazon, and Atlassian.

At NMIMS, Mumbai, the MBA HR program had an average salary of INR 19.40 L, with more than 180 companies participating. The highest salary this year was INR 57.65 L for the MBA Core program and INR 29.09 L for the HR cohort. Notable recruiters included EXL Acumen, J&J Quest, M&MI Rise for Good, PVMI - Make a dent, Reliance T.U.P, Godrej Loud, and more. IIM Shillong's 2022 placements drive saw 100% of students placed for the PGP 2020-22 batch. The highest package for IIM Shillong placements in 2022 was INR 55.22 LPA, while the average package offered was INR 23.10 LPA. PGP HR saw participation from companies like Bosch, D.E. Shaw, HSBC Bank, Mahindra Logistics, Paytm, and Titan, which offered prominent roles in various sectors.

IIM Shillong has a smaller batch size compared to NMIMS Mumbai and MDI Gurgaon. MDI Gurgaon and NMIMS have stronger industry and alumni connections compared to IIM Shillong, and they also benefit from their location. IIM Shillong has a strong brand value, but other than that, MDI Gurgaon is the best choice for MBA in HRM, followed by XLRI, IIM Ranchi, SCMHRD, and IMI Delhi.

data.question: How good is IIM Shillong as compared to IIFT Delhi?

basic.answer:
It is true that IIFT Delhi has a strong reputation and a good placement record. Over the past three years, students have consistently earned an average salary package of INR 20 LPA or higher. In the latest placement drive for the 2020-22 batch of the MBA (IB) program, IIFT Delhi achieved 100% placements with 82 companies participating. The highest international CTC was INR 80 LPA, the highest domestic CTC was INR 46.5 LPA, and the average CTC was INR 25.16 LPA. Approximately 25% of the students were placed in the consulting domain.

When choosing a business school, it's important to consider factors such as placements, alumni support, exposure to the industry, and available resources like libraries and research papers. Location can also be a factor, as being in Delhi may provide more opportunities for exploration and connection with potential employers compared to Shillong. Ultimately, it's important to weigh all of these factors and choose the school that best meets your needs and goals.

data.question: How does IIM Shillong compare to the older IIMs?

author.name: Apoorva Murjani
author.title: MBA from Faculty of Management Studies, University of Delhi (Graduated 2018)

basic.answer:
It is difficult to make a direct comparison between IIM Shillong and the older IIMs, as they have different histories and areas of focus. IIM Shillong is a relatively newer IIM, having been established in 2007, while the older IIMs have been in existence for much longer.

In terms of comparison, IIM Shillong can be considered on par with IIM Indore and IIM Kozhikode, as IIM Ahmedabad is far ahead in terms of reputation. While the companies that visit Shillong also visit Indore and Kozhikode, these campuses have their own set of marquee recruiters that Shillong has not yet been able to attract, such as TAS, HUL, BCG, and others.

According to NIRF rankings, IIM Shillong is ranked 26th. However, rankings should not be the only factor considered when evaluating a business school. There are many other factors that contribute to the quality of a college, and it is important to consider other factors such as curriculum, faculty, industry connections, and alumni network.

IIM Shillong has a strong focus on research and has partnerships with several international universities and organizations. It also has a diverse student body and a strong alumni network. Ultimately, it is up to each individual to decide which business school is the best fit for their goals and needs. IIM Shillong may be behind IIM Indore and IIM Kozhikode in some areas but is likely to grow and narrow the gap in the coming years.

data.question: Which IIM is better: IIM Shillong, IIM Udaipur, or IIM Trichy?

author.name: Kishley Sharma
author.title: Studied at Indian Institute of Management Shillong

basic.answer:
I don’t see why people keep comparing the older IIMs to newer ones. No matter how good a new IIM is doing, it can never compare to an older established IIM. The same is the case here. IIM Trichy and IIM Udaipur are indeed growing at an excellent rate, but IIM Shillong still is the winner of the race. This is because of its early establishment and being a member of the top IIMs family BLACKIS. That in itself is an accomplishment that the new IIMs have failed to achieve.

IIM Shillong is the 7th IIM and is among the top B Schools in India. Ever since its establishment, it has been growing at a tremendous pace and its placements are a testament to that. The brand value it enjoys because of being a part of BLACKIS is much more than any new IIM. This brand value helps you in the long run.

data.question: Which one should I join, IIM Shillong vs IIFT Kolkata (Delhi possible)?

author.name: Mayank Bhatia
author.title: studied at Indian Institute of Foreign Trade, Delhi

basic.answer:
You should choose IIFT. Here are the reasons why. 

  • IIFT brand is more than 50 years old and well recognized in the industry. While IIM Shillong is a new IIM. Except for the IIM tag, the institute isn’t much recognized.
  • In the International Business domain, IIFT is widely recognized. The institute has established its name in the niche through research and related assignments. As of now, IIM Shillong hasn’t distinguished itself in any domain. 
  • If you compare the batch profile of these colleges, you will observe that IIFT has a better batch profile in terms of work experience, UG college, etc. 
  • As IIFT is an older B-school, it has a huge alumni network. 
  • IIFT is located in metro cities like Kolkata and Delhi. While Shillong has a remote ocation. Due to the locational advantages, students of IIFTrecive better internships and live projects. 

Due to these factors, IIFT is better than IIM Shillong.

data.question: What is the comparison between IIFT and IIM Shillong?

author.name: Arshit Jain
author.title: M.B.A. Finance & Operations Management, Indian Institute of Foreign Trade, Delhi (2018)

basic.answer:
It is no longer the case that the "IIM" brand carries the same weight for all business schools. Each individual Indian Institute of Management (IIM) now has its own distinct brand value and perception, and the word after the "IIM" tag is what will truly matter. For example, IIM Ahmedabad will have a different brand value from IIM Lucknow, which will be different from IIM Kozhikode or IIM Shillong, and so on. With the expansion of the IIM network, with a goal of having an IIM in every state, it may become less meaningful to be accepted into an IIM in general.

Generally speaking, older business schools tend to have more and better opportunities than IIFT due to their larger alumni networks and longer histories of the establishment. Additionally, business schools located in metropolitan areas may have better accessibility for recruiters, leading to more favorable placements for students.

data.question: What's the general perception of IIM Shillong?

basic.answer:
There are several general perceptions about IIM Shillong that may be worth addressing in order to provide a more accurate picture of the business school.

One perception is that IIM Shillong is located in a remote area and therefore lacks access to the same opportunities as more metropolitan business schools. However, this is not necessarily the case. In reality, many of the same companies that visit other top business schools like the Indian Institutes of Management in Bangalore and Kolkata also visit IIM Shillong. Additionally, companies come to the North East region to recruit both technical and managerial talent from IIM Shillong, as well as other top schools like IIT Guwahati and IIT Kharagpur.

Another perception is that IIM Shillong lacks proper infrastructure due to its temporary campus. However, the current campus, which has been in operation for the past 10 years, is equipped with the latest technologies and is on par with other top business schools in terms of infrastructure.

A third perception is that IIM Shillong has poor-quality students and faculty. However, this is not true. In reality, students who are accepted to IIM Shillong have typically scored very highly on the Common Admission Test (CAT), with a percentile score above 98%. Additionally, the business school has guest faculty from reputable colleges abroad who teach a number of elective courses that rotate across the major IIMs. Overall, these factors suggest that IIM Shillong is a high-quality business school that offers a strong education and a range of opportunities for its students.

basic.answer:
MDI will be a better option for all specializations, except Operations. If you are interested in Operations, IIT Bombay is much better. MDI Gurgaon placements are excellent. qna_data.question: How good is the PGPEx program at IIM Shillong?

basic.answer:
There is often a misunderstanding about placements at IIMs after course completion. It is important to understand that placements are entirely student-driven and depend on the individual's efforts and abilities. Many PGPEX programs at IIMs have a significant number of students from IT services, and these students may not be as diversified or knowledgeable about other industry segments. This can create a gap between the companies and the students and may result in a lower placement rate for some students. 

Unfortunately, many students who enroll in PGPEX programs do so based on their academic profiles or high scores on entrance exams, rather than their knowledge or experience in other industries. As a result, students who come from non-IT backgrounds may be more successful in securing placements due to their diverse understanding of general management. This is a common issue at all IIMs, and even IIM-L and IIM-I are taking steps to reduce these risks.

article.description:
IIM Shillong established in 2007 is a public management institution, affiliated with the North Eastern Hill University (NEHU). IIM Shillong has been ranked 24th among the top management institutes in India by NIRF Ranking 2024. The institute has a strong employment track record, with alumni being hired by top Indian and worldwide organisations. Check: Is IIM Shillong worth joining?

IIM Shillong offers a flagship two-year full-time PGDM with an intake of around 238 students. IIM Shillong admission is done through CAT exam, followed by a Personal Interview. IIM Shillong CAT cut-off is around 90 percentile (Overall) and 75 Percentile (Sectional). IIM Shillong PGDM fees is INR 15 Lakhs for 2 years. IIM Shillong placements 2024 concluded with the highest package of INR 71.50 LPA, while the average package was INR 26.10 LPA. Top Recruiter of IIM Shillong include TCS, Accenture, Google, Cognizant etc.

At IIM Shillong, the minimum composite score for the 2023-25 batch was 60.9 for PGP. A total of 147347 general category candidates selected IIM Shillong as their CAT preference, of which 3859 were shortlisted for the PI WAT round and 894 received the final offer.

Scholarship Financial aid based on need is offered. Financial aid based on need is given to students whose household income is less than INR 9 lakh per year. Students who have a family income of below INR 5 lakh annually are eligible for need-based financial help.

Life at IIM Shillong

IIM Shillong is nestled in a beautiful environment, bordered by pine trees, a refreshing lake, and lovely walking pathways. The campus has classrooms, hostel accommodation, a mess/café, a sports compound, hi-tech computer labs, and many other amenities. The campus features four dormitory complexes with amenities such as sports, entertainment, and mess facilities. 

Classes at IIM Shillong begin at 9 a.m. Each session is typically 1.5 hours long and includes lectures, lively discussions, case studies, demonstrations, etc. Classes often conclude and continue until 6 p.m., and some sessions are also offered at night. The rest of the working hour is spent in group or club gatherings, preparing projects, and preparing for the following day's lectures.

FAQs

Ques. What percentage is required to get admitted to the MBA programme at IIM Shillong?

Ans. To get selected for the GD/PI in IIM Shillong, aspirants must take the CAT and achieve a minimum percentage of 75 in each section.

Ques. Which domain is best at IIM Shillong?

Ans. The IT as well as Analytics sectors provided the highest package in 2024, while the Consulting, as well as Strategy sectors, received the most offers.

Ques. Which industries' companies extended a significant number of employment offers?

Ans. 31% of offers came from companies in the consulting industry, followed by BFSI at 23% along with manufacturing & retail at 20%.

Ques. What is the maximum stipend offered by IIM Shillong?

Ans. Throughout the summer internship programme for placement of class 2023-25, the maximum compensation provided was INR 5.21 lakhs.

Ques. What is the typical stipend that IIM Shillong offers?

Ans. Throughout the summer internship programme for placement of class 2023-25, the average salary provided was INR 1.96 lakhs.

Ques. Does IIM Shillong provide its students with any financial aid?

Ans. Yes, IIM Shillong offers scholarships to MBA participants who are economically disadvantaged in addition to helping them get educational loans, through the Need-Based Financial Assistance Scheme, 

Ques. What's life like at IIM Shillong?

Ans. The life at IIM Shillong is fast-paced and demanding, yet it is simultaneous. All year long, there are celebrations and festivities. The students participate in cultural clubs, sporting events, contests, and other activities in addition to their all-day tasks and presentations.

Ques. Is there a hostel on campus at IIM Shillong?

Ans. There are hostels on the IIM Shillong campus. There are four hostels for boys and girls, offering shared and single accommodations with all the necessities included.

Ques. How was the summer internship at IIM Shillong?

Ans. IIM Shillong recorded 72 employers throughout the placement drive via summertime internship for the class 2023-25. During the internship placement, the maximum compensation granted was INR 5.21 lakhs, while the average stipend was INR 1.98 lakhs.

Ques. Is enrolling at IIM Shillong worthwhile?

Ans. The highest package at IIM Shillong placement 2024 was INR 71.50 LPA, while the average package was INR 26.10 LPA. 87 students received PPO/PPIs through their summer internships. 

Ques. What is the IIM Shillong Placement year-over-year trend?

Ans. IIM Shillong 2024 highest package increased in 2024 but the average package decreased by 3.18%.

Ques. What was the number of PPOs or PPIs available at the Placement Drive at IIM Shillong 2023 ?

Ans. In 2024, 87 students received PPOs during the IIM Shillong Placements, 

Ques. What was the number of students that took part in the 2024 IIM Shillong Placements?

Ans. 283 students took part in the 2024 IIM Shillong Placements.

Ques. How many new recruiters took part in the 2024 IIM Shillong Placements?

Ans. 46 new recruiters took part in the 2023 IIM Shillong Placements 2024.

Ques. Which MBA package at IIM Shillong is the highest?

Ans. The highest package offered by IIM Shillong throughout the 2024 hiring campaign was INR 71.50 LPA.

Ques. Should you pursue an MBA in IIM Shillong?

Ans. Yes, each year the MBA class at IIM Shillong obtains competitive remuneration packages. The annual growth is positive for the MBA class at IIM Shillong as well. Therefore, it is worthwhile to enrol in the MBA programme at IIM Shillong.

Ques. What is the status of PGPEx placement at IIM Shillong?

Ans. In 2024, there was a 100% placement rate for Executive MBAs at IIM Shillong. Thirty-seven pupils took part in the recruitment drive and were all placed in the top agencies.

Ques. What distinguishes PGPEx from PGP?

Ans. In response, the PGPEx programme is a residential one-year course intended especially for professionals with prior work experience. On the other hand, PGP is a two-year residential programme intended for recent graduates and entry-level managers.

Ques. Can we participate in the PGPEx programme at IIM Shillong virtually?

Ans. No, PGPEx is a residential programme that must be completed on campus full-time.

Ques. What is the minimal amount of job experience needed to apply to PGPEx at IIM Shillong?

Ans. The candidates should have worked full-time for at least five years after graduation. Candidates who have worked in a field outside of India for at least a year are eligible for a one-year relaxation.

Ques. Is completing the PGPEx programme at IIM Shillong worthwhile?

Ans. IIM Shillong and Ocean University China have teamed to provide the PGPEx programme and train leaders in business behaviour. Therefore, pursuing PGPEx through IIM Shillong is worthwhile.

Ques. Is IIM Shillong a tier-1 B-school?

Ans. Although it does not appear in the top 10, IIM Shillong is regarded as a tier-1 B-school.

Ques. Does the International immersion programme cost more for PGPEx students at IIM Shillong?

Ans. Yes, aspirants need to pay an additional amount of INR 4 Lakhs for the overseas immersion programme in addition to the PGPEx total.

Ques. Does enrolling at IIM Shillong make sense?

Ans. Yes. Enrolling in IIM Shillong is worthwhile as it offers students an excellent education and adheres to the same programme as other IIMs. The institute offers study-abroad programmes through international agreements with various overseas institutes. In the past two years, IIM Shillong has had a 100% placement rate.

Ques. How much does an MBA at IIM Shillong cost?

Ans. The MBA programme at IIM Shillong costs INR 15 Lakhs for the 2 year program. 

Ques. Can I apply without a CAT to IIM Shillong?

Ans. No, IIM Shillong exclusively accepts applicants for MBA programmes through the CAT exam. 

Ques. How can I get into IIM Shillong?

Ans. IIM Shillong admissions are possible through the Common Admission Test (CAT) followed by a personal interview.

Ques. What are the minimal requirements to be eligible for an MBA at IIM Shillong?

Ans. To apply to the MBA programme at IIM Shillong, students must have completed their 10+2 having a minimum of 50% of their grades in the aggregate.

Ques. What is IIM Shillong's CAT cutoff date?

Ans. The CAT cut-off at IIM Shillong is 75 percentile sectional for the general category. 

Ques. How much does PGPEX cost at IIM Shillong?

Ans. At IIM Shillong, the PGPEx cost around INR 20.4 Lakhs 

Ques. What is the minimum GMAT score needed to apply to IIM Shillong PGPEx?

Ans. For the PGPEx programme at IIM Shillong the applicants must have a GMAT score of at least 500.

Ques. Is there WAT at IIM Shillong?

Ans. No, WAT is not conducted at IIM Shillong. Candidates are chosen via a round of personal interviews and CAT results.

Ques. When would IIM Shillong publish the list of applicants it has shortlisted for PI?

Ans. The shortlisted applicants for PI are typically announced by IIM Shillong in mid-January.

Ques. Is there an age limitation to apply for a PhD at IIM Shillong?

Ans. Applicants for the PhD programme at IIM Shillong must no be older than 30 years. The five-year exemption is limited to female candidates, as well as those who fall under the categories of OBC, ST, SC, PwD, or even transgender applicants.

Ques. How long does the PhD programme for working professionals at IIM Shillong take?

Ans. The PhD programme for working professionals is offered by IIM Shillong for four years, with the possibility of an additional year's extension.

Ques. What distinguishes PGP-WE from PGPEx and also PGP at IIM Shillong?

Ans. PGPWE is a two-year MBA programme that offers live online sessions regularly. It is intended for working adults who want to pursue further education without taking a break in their careers. The PGPWE students can work while they are enrolled in classes, whereas PGP along with PGPEx are a full- residential course.

Ques. When accepting an enrollment offer, would IIM Shillong require payment of a confirmation fee?

Ans. Yes, to accept the proposals and secure their admission, applicants who have received offer letters will need to pay the confirmation fee.

Ques. Which year's GMAT and CAT results are acceptable for admission to IIM Shillong PGPEx?

Ans. For PGPEx enrollment, IIM Shillong accepts the CAT results from the previous two years and the GMAT from the previous five years.

Ques. After meeting the requirements of the CAT 2023 Cutoff for IIM Shillong, is there any financial aid available?

And. Yes, IIM Shillong offers the Tailored to needs-based Financial Support Scheme to assist participants in the PGP who are economically disadvantaged. The yearly annual revenue of the family, each student's liquidity, their financial standing, and general fitness for the programme are taken into consideration when determining the assortment of scholarship recipients and the amount of funding awarded. Scholarships are further offered to students in the restricted category.

Ques. What is the process for choosing students to get admitted to IIMs alongside other partnering B-Schools during CAT 2023?

Ans. Generally, a two to three-step selection procedure consisting of a round of Group Discussion, Written Ability Test (WAT), and Personal Interview (PI) is used by the IIMs and other participating B-Schools to shortlist candidates for admission.

She holds 5-years of experience in the content writing industry, including a successful stint as a freelance writer as well. comments.content: When are the results for IIM Shillong expected to be released?

replies.content: Based on publicly available information, the results for the IIM Shillong PGP program are expected to be released in the first week of May 2024.

comments.content: What is the scope for freshers in IIM Shillong Placement?

replies.content: 27% of the freshers (with work expereince) received the placement oppurtunities in IIM Shillong. Most of the freshers were placed in Consulting and Strategry sectors. The average placement package offered is INR 26.96 LPA. Axis bank, HDFC bank, Adani, JSW, Tata are some of top recruiters of IIM Shillong Freshers.

comments.content: IIM Shillong has released its result and I have not yet received any email from the institute. Where can I check my results by myself?

replies.content: IIM Shillong has released Shortlist for Admission 2024 on January 17.  Shortlisted students have received Emails and SMSs on their registered Email ID and Mobile No. The IIM Shillong PI shortlist will be available on the IIM Shillong website. The candidates can check their IIM Shillong admission status by entering their CAT 2023 registration number and email ID for MBA admission 2024. The IIM Shillong shortlisted candidates can apply for the interview rounds.

comments.content: Does IIM Shillong provide any counselling to help decide the students their major and minor courses after first year?

replies.content: Yes, IIM Shillong provide any counselling to help decide the students their major and minor courses after first year. The elective courses are offered in the second year to the participants with the opportunity to concentrate on their areas of interest.

comments.content: I want to do PhD in economics... please help me regarding program fee and duration

replies.content: A Master’s Degree (bachelor’s degree obtained in 10+2+3 pattern, followed by a master’s degree) or a 5-year Integrated Master’s Degree (obtained after completing higher secondary schooling in 10+2 pattern) in any discipline, with at least 55% marks in the bachelor’s and 60% in the master’s degrees. A Master’s Degree (A 4-year / 8-semester Bachelor’s degree (10+2+4 pattern) with at least 6.5 CGPA or equivalent marks, followed by a master’s degree. A professional qualification like CA, ICWA, or CS with at least 55% marks in a B.Com degree

comments.content: dear sir/mam,can i apply for 2024 .my msc completed in 2017.

replies.content: If you want to apply for PhD course after M.Sc, then you can surely apply as there is no age gap limit criteria for the students.
You can get the IIM Shillong brochure by searching the same on the web browser and can also download it in PDF Form.

comments.content: Does it takes long for u mam/ sir to call me cos I'm have to prepare for the coming month exam..Thnku

replies.content: The IIM Shillong does not contact the candidate, but you can contact the college at 0364-2308000.

comments.content: Does IIM Shillong have fee waivers?

replies.content: IIM offers need-based financial assistance and education loan to economically weak students. They will be given an amount as the stipend as per the government norms.

comments.content: What are the types of financial aids offered at IIM Shillong?

replies.content: No, the institute offers three types of financial aid offered. It includes educational loans, need-based financial assistance, and scholarship from the government of India.

comments.content: Cut off for cat in IIM shillong

replies.content: CAT cutoff is different for the different categories at IIM Shillong. It includes 75 percentile for general, 75 for EWS, 60 for SC, 50 for ST and 50 for PWD students. Check here for the IIM Shillong cutoff

04 Apr, 2025

  • IIM Shillong Final Placement Report for PGP Batch 2022-2024 is out. A total of 87 recruiters participated in the placement drive and the highest CTC offered stands at INR 71.50 LPA. Further, the average & median CTC offered stands at INR 26.10 LPA & INR 25.67 LPA respectively. 
     
  • IIM Shillong has released the Summer Placement Report 2023-2024 for Post-Graduate Programme in Management. The highest stipend offered was INR 5,21,000 while the median stipend was INR 1,70,000 and the average stipend offered stood at INR 1,98,000.  Additionally, 46% of the offers were extended in the Sales & Marketing domain.

In the past two years, IIM Shillong has had a 100% placement rate."}},{"@type":"Question","name":" How much does an MBA at IIM Shillong cost?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":" The MBA programme at IIM Shillong costs INR 15 Lakhs for the 2 year program."}},{"@type":"Question","name":" Can I apply without a CAT to IIM Shillong?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":" No, IIM Shillong exclusively accepts applicants for MBA programmes through the CAT exam."}},{"@type":"Question","name":" How can I get into IIM Shillong?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":" IIM Shillong admissions are possible through the Common Admission Test (CAT) followed by a personal interview."}},{"@type":"Question","name":" What are the minimal requirements to be eligible for an MBA at IIM Shillong?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":" To apply to the MBA programme at IIM Shillong, students must have completed their 10+2 having a minimum of 50% of their grades in the aggregate."}},{"@type":"Question","name":" What is IIM Shillong's CAT cutoff date?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":" The CAT cut-off at IIM Shillong is 75 percentile sectional for the general category."}},{"@type":"Question","name":" How much does PGPEX cost at IIM Shillong?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":" At IIM Shillong, the PGPEx cost around INR 20.4 Lakhs"}},{"@type":"Question","name":" What is the minimum GMAT score needed to apply to IIM Shillong PGPEx?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":" For the PGPEx programme at IIM Shillong the applicants must have a GMAT score of at least 500."}},{"@type":"Question","name":" Is there WAT at IIM Shillong?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":" No, WAT is not conducted at IIM Shillong. Candidates are chosen via a round of personal interviews and CAT results."}},{"@type":"Question","name":" When would IIM Shillong publish the list of applicants it has shortlisted for PI?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":" The shortlisted applicants for PI are typically announced by IIM Shillong in mid-January."}},{"@type":"Question","name":" Is there an age limitation to apply for a PhD at IIM Shillong?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":" Applicants for the PhD programme at IIM Shillong must no be older than 30 years. The five-year exemption is limited to female candidates, as well as those who fall under the categories of OBC, ST, SC, PwD, or even transgender applicants."}},{"@type":"Question","name":" How long does the PhD programme for working professionals at IIM Shillong take?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":" The PhD programme for working professionals is offered by IIM Shillong for four years, with the possibility of an additional year's extension."}},{"@type":"Question","name":" What distinguishes PGP-WE from PGPEx and also PGP at IIM Shillong?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":" PGPWE is a two-year MBA programme that offers live online sessions regularly. It is intended for working adults who want to pursue further education without taking a break in their careers. The PGPWE students can work while they are enrolled in classes, whereas PGP along with PGPEx are a full- residential course."}},{"@type":"Question","name":" When accepting an enrollment offer, would IIM Shillong require payment of a confirmation fee?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":" Yes, to accept the proposals and secure their admission, applicants who have received offer letters will need to pay the confirmation fee."}},{"@type":"Question","name":" Which year's GMAT and CAT results are acceptable for admission to IIM Shillong PGPEx?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":" For PGPEx enrollment, IIM Shillong accepts the CAT results from the previous two years and the GMAT from the previous five years."}},{"@type":"Question","name":" After meeting the requirements of the CAT 2023 Cutoff for IIM Shillong, is there any financial aid available?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"And. Scholarships are further offered to students in the restricted category."}},{"@type":"Question","name":" What is the process for choosing students to get admitted to IIMs alongside other partnering B-Schools during CAT 2023?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":" Generally, a two to three-step selection procedure consisting of a round of Group Discussion, Written Ability Test (WAT), and Personal Interview (PI) is used by the IIMs and other participating B-Schools to shortlist candidates for admission."}},{"@type":"Question","name":" Is IIM Shillong worth joining?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":" During IIM Shillong Placements 2024, the highest package stood at INR 71.50 LPA & the average package stood at INR 26.10LPA. Students are usually given twin sharing rooms in the first year."}},{"@type":"Question","name":" What facilities have been provided at IIM Shillong Hostels?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":" A set of basic luxuries like bed, chair, table, cupboard, and facilities like 24*7 electricity, water supply, Wi-Fi, common rooms, mess etc. are available at IIM Shillong Hostels."}},{"@type":"Question","name":" Are there gymnasium equipment at IIM Shillong Hostels?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":" Yes, there is a gymnasium and related equipment at IM Shillong hostels for health and fitness activities."}},{"@type":"Question","name":" Is the library accessible to IIM Shillong Hostel students?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":" Yes, the functional library which is the knowledge center at IIM Shillong Hostel is available for students living at hostels. The students have access to all sorts of readable resources and databases throughout."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"How good is IIM Shillong's PGPEX programme and how good are its placements?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"My brother received an interview call from IIM Shillong for their PGPEX program. This was a few years back. He wanted to join the course because he felt it would be beneficial for his corporate career. The teaching model at IIM Shillong focuses on developing Asian economies like China. The PGPEX is comparatively affordable at IIM Shillong, compared to other management schools. But the top management schools host international teachers as visiting faculty for their courses. Now here is the catch. The placements of IIM Shillong are entirely student driven. My brother reached out to a faculty member who was clear that the college offers its students a platform, but it can’t guarantee placements. During placements your entire profile will get you an offer, not just your ‘IIM Shillong’ tag. After careful consideration, my brother decided to not opt for PGPEX at IIM Shillong."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"What are the selection criteria for IIM Shillong?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"The admissions process for the Post-Graduate Program (PGP) at IIM Shillong involves two stages. In the first stage, candidates who have qualified through the Common Admission Test (CAT) are shortlisted and invited to take the Writing Skills Assessment Test (WSAT) and participate in a Personal Interview (PI). The second stage involves the creation of a final merit list based on the candidates' performance in the WSAT, PI, and other relevant factors such as their GMAT scores, scholastic performance, and work experience. Overseas candidates will also go through a similar process, with the Admissions Committee carefully reviewing their applications and shortlisting those who meet the necessary criteria. These candidates will then be invited to take the WSAT and participate in a PI, which may be held in one of four cities in India or conducted remotely via video conferencing. The final selection of candidates is based on their performance in the WSAT, PI, and the criteria used for shortlisting them for the PI. Tentative offers of admission will be made by the end of April, and registration for the PGP program is tentatively scheduled for the first week of July at the IIM Shillong campus."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Which one is better PGP-HRM MDI, MBA-core NMIMS, or IIM Shillong?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"If you're interested in PGP HRM, IIM Shillong is the best option in India in terms of placements. The average placement at MDI Gurgaon this year was INR 23.80 LPA, with a median package of INR 23.50 LPA and the highest package of INR 35.57 LPA. Top recruiters included Asian Paints, Infoedge India Limited, Axis Bank, Microsoft, Godrej, KPMG, HCL, Deloitte, Samsung, Google, Amazon, and Atlassian. At NMIMS, Mumbai, the MBA HR program had an average salary of INR 19.40 L, with more than 180 companies participating. The highest salary this year was INR 57.65 L for the MBA Core program and INR 29.09 L for the HR cohort. Notable recruiters included EXL Acumen, J&J Quest, M&MI Rise for Good, PVMI - Make a dent, Reliance T.U.P, Godrej Loud, and more. IIM Shillong's 2022 placements drive saw 100% of students placed for the PGP 2020-22 batch. The highest package for IIM Shillong placements in 2022 was INR 55.22 LPA, while the average package offered was INR 23.10 LPA. PGP HR saw participation from companies like Bosch, D.E. Shaw, HSBC Bank, Mahindra Logistics, Paytm, and Titan, which offered prominent roles in various sectors. IIM Shillong has a smaller batch size compared to NMIMS Mumbai and MDI Gurgaon. MDI Gurgaon and NMIMS have stronger industry and alumni connections compared to IIM Shillong, and they also benefit from their location. IIM Shillong has a strong brand value, but other than that, MDI Gurgaon is the best choice for MBA in HRM, followed by XLRI, IIM Ranchi, SCMHRD, and IMI Delhi."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"How good is IIM Shillong as compared to IIFT Delhi?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"It is true that IIFT Delhi has a strong reputation and a good placement record. Over the past three years, students have consistently earned an average salary package of INR 20 LPA or higher. In the latest placement drive for the 2020-22 batch of the MBA (IB) program, IIFT Delhi achieved 100% placements with 82 companies participating. The highest international CTC was INR 80 LPA, the highest domestic CTC was INR 46.5 LPA, and the average CTC was INR 25.16 LPA. Approximately 25% of the students were placed in the consulting domain. When choosing a business school, it's important to consider factors such as placements, alumni support, exposure to the industry, and available resources like libraries and research papers. Location can also be a factor, as being in Delhi may provide more opportunities for exploration and connection with potential employers compared to Shillong. Ultimately, it's important to weigh all of these factors and choose the school that best meets your needs and goals."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"How does IIM Shillong compare to the older IIMs?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"It is difficult to make a direct comparison between IIM Shillong and the older IIMs, as they have different histories and areas of focus. IIM Shillong is a relatively newer IIM, having been established in 2007, while the older IIMs have been in existence for much longer. In terms of comparison, IIM Shillong can be considered on par with IIM Indore and IIM Kozhikode, as IIM Ahmedabad is far ahead in terms of reputation. While the companies that visit Shillong also visit Indore and Kozhikode, these campuses have their own set of marquee recruiters that Shillong has not yet been able to attract, such as TAS, HUL, BCG, and others. According to NIRF rankings, IIM Shillong is ranked 26th. However, rankings should not be the only factor considered when evaluating a business school. There are many other factors that contribute to the quality of a college, and it is important to consider other factors such as curriculum, faculty, industry connections, and alumni network. IIM Shillong has a strong focus on research and has partnerships with several international universities and organizations. It also has a diverse student body and a strong alumni network. Ultimately, it is up to each individual to decide which business school is the best fit for their goals and needs. IIM Shillong may be behind IIM Indore and IIM Kozhikode in some areas but is likely to grow and narrow the gap in the coming years."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Which IIM is better: IIM Shillong, IIM Udaipur, or IIM Trichy?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"I don’t see why people keep comparing the older IIMs to newer ones. No matter how good a new IIM is doing, it can never compare to an older established IIM. The same is the case here. IIM Trichy and IIM Udaipur are indeed growing at an excellent rate, but IIM Shillong still is the winner of the race. This is because of its early establishment and being a member of the top IIMs family BLACKIS. That in itself is an accomplishment that the new IIMs have failed to achieve. IIM Shillong is the 7th IIM and is among the top B Schools in India. Ever since its establishment, it has been growing at a tremendous pace and its placements are a testament to that. The brand value it enjoys because of being a part of BLACKIS is much more than any new IIM. This brand value helps you in the long run."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Which one should I join, IIM Shillong vs IIFT Kolkata (Delhi possible)?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"You should choose IIFT. Here are the reasons why. IIFT brand is more than 50 years old and well recognized in the industry. While IIM Shillong is a new IIM. Except for the IIM tag, the institute isn’t much recognized. In the International Business domain, IIFT is widely recognized. The institute has established its name in the niche through research and related assignments. As of now, IIM Shillong hasn’t distinguished itself in any domain. If you compare the batch profile of these colleges, you will observe that IIFT has a better batch profile in terms of work experience, UG college, etc. As IIFT is an older B-school, it has a huge alumni network. IIFT is located in metro cities like Kolkata and Delhi. While Shillong has a remote ocation. Due to the locational advantages, students of IIFTrecive better internships and live projects. Due to these factors, IIFT is better than IIM Shillong."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"What is the comparison between IIFT and IIM Shillong?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"It is no longer the case that the \"IIM\" brand carries the same weight for all business schools. Each individual Indian Institute of Management (IIM) now has its own distinct brand value and perception, and the word after the \"IIM\" tag is what will truly matter. For example, IIM Ahmedabad will have a different brand value from IIM Lucknow, which will be different from IIM Kozhikode or IIM Shillong, and so on. With the expansion of the IIM network, with a goal of having an IIM in every state, it may become less meaningful to be accepted into an IIM in general. Generally speaking, older business schools tend to have more and better opportunities than IIFT due to their larger alumni networks and longer histories of the establishment. Additionally, business schools located in metropolitan areas may have better accessibility for recruiters, leading to more favorable placements for students."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"What's the general perception of IIM Shillong?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"There are several general perceptions about IIM Shillong that may be worth addressing in order to provide a more accurate picture of the business school. One perception is that IIM Shillong is located in a remote area and therefore lacks access to the same opportunities as more metropolitan business schools. However, this is not necessarily the case. In reality, many of the same companies that visit other top business schools like the Indian Institutes of Management in Bangalore and Kolkata also visit IIM Shillong. Additionally, companies come to the North East region to recruit both technical and managerial talent from IIM Shillong, as well as other top schools like IIT Guwahati and IIT Kharagpur. Another perception is that IIM Shillong lacks proper infrastructure due to its temporary campus. However, the current campus, which has been in operation for the past 10 years, is equipped with the latest technologies and is on par with other top business schools in terms of infrastructure. A third perception is that IIM Shillong has poor-quality students and faculty. However, this is not true. In reality, students who are accepted to IIM Shillong have typically scored very highly on the Common Admission Test (CAT), with a percentile score above 98%. Additionally, the business school has guest faculty from reputable colleges abroad who teach a number of elective courses that rotate across the major IIMs. Overall, these factors suggest that IIM Shillong is a high-quality business school that offers a strong education and a range of opportunities for its students."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Do IIM Shillong take class 10\/12 marks into consideration?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"The class 10 and 12th marks are not directly linked to the shortlisting of GD\/PI and even for Final Selection in IIM Shillong. IIM Shillong has not defined the weightage for academics for 2022 MBA admissions. An expected set of scores, for students from different categories, is as follows: Category Class 10 marks Class 12 marks General 80 80 EWS 80 80 SC 55 55 ST 50 50 PWD 50 50 Candidates who fulfill the above cutoff criteria will be considered for shortlisting into PI rounds and will be segregated as per their discipline in graduation."}}]}
